entry.title: Instant / contactless payments
entry.summary: It seems that the first part of the context is discussing the possibility of generating a PDF receipt and sending it via NFC to avoid an additional tap during payment. The BIP70 payment protocol could potentially support this. The idea is to make the payment process more intuitive. The second part of the context is about using contactless cards for payment instead of enrolling specifically for Oyster card in London. The person suggests that Oyster and similar city cards may eventually be phased out as contactless credit cards become more prevalent.
